website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive  dehumidifier offers features and capabilities that are hard to find in a model with a price tag of less than $100; but it also comes with some concerns.
pros: Spacious water tank that can hold 2.5 liters
Practical for small- to mid-sized rooms
Has sterilization capabilities powered by UV light and negative ion technology
Attractive design and fairly quiet operation
cons: Not as effective in extremely humid conditions
A few customers gripe about it malfunctioning after several months of use

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a 25 square foot space.  Anything larger, get something else.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work. I had it in a 170 sf space, in a very humid climate and it was only pulling about one tray of water a day. I was sweltering and everything was moist and damp. Ugh I returned it and bought a different brand and model. Plugged that in and it's pulling 3 trays of water a day. Same space, same location, same climate. This one looks pretty but I'll take function over form any day when it comes to a DE-humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lol they got me (should be 1 star)
customer_reviews.text: Broken English leads to miscommunication. That's what happened here. Also, 2.5L is not 8.8oz. It's not false advertisement. It's just poor advertisement and the instructions were just as difficult to read. It has run in my 12' X11' bedroom for 3 days straight and the humidity is at 75%. Oh and that power pack is hot as hell...like way too much heat resistance. It's good for an area that just needs an air purifier. It's not taking water out of your living space at any recognizable rate. You'll wish they used lube when you see your electric bill though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the bathroom. . So far so good, it works as stated in the advertisement. Runs quietly, Easy instructions. I am well pleased with this Dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: ErCw

customer_reviews.title: Works well, until it doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: I put this humidifier in our master bedroom so that we could cut down on the use of air conditioning but still sleep comfortably. For over a month it has worked really well, until it stopped dehumidifying. I have checked out the plumbing that i can get to without taking the system apart but i cant see any obvious problems. Of course I cant return the unit because it broke 1 week after the return date on Amazon allowed me to. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R

customer_reviews.title: poorly working, had to buy additional unit (different brand)
customer_reviews.text: I got this unit and it was taking out water... .however maybe a glass a day. Got a different unit and it takes out 2L a day which shows how much water the other was leaving. now I need to trash some of the items as they got moldy from all the humidity. DO NOT RECOOMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy unless you have good house insurence
customer_reviews.text: Its alot louder then i expected and the plug in has a brick on it that gets almost to hot to touch. After 4 houra running it had very little watter in it and the power cord was so hot I shut it off and will not use again. DONT BUY IT UNLESS YOU HAVE GOOS HOUSE INSURENCE
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Either buy the warranty or don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It started out very quiet, worked great, and helped the moisture issue 100%; but after a few months the fan started making a rattling noise. I was able to make the fan stop temporarily by cleaning the machine, but after a weeks it persisted again. After unplugging the machine and letting it sit idle for a month or so, we just tried using it again and it won’t start, light up, or turn on. I guess buy the 2 year warranty as I literally bought my machine 1 year and 9 days ago. :(
customer_reviews.author: A Daggy

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend for this dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: My dad has severe chronic pain which for some reason. So we decided try a dehumidifier .I can't believe how much water it pulls out of the air. It's helping with his pain.I highly recommend for this dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Small but effective
customer_reviews.text: Works well for such a small unit, it's helped dry out our bedroom in our damp basement apartment. It's a little nosier than I expected but not too bad, and it is small enough to tuck into a corner easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for office, very quiet and small enough to not be so overbearing... Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Dehumidifier worked wonderfully until just 1yr after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, removed humidity in small spaces. I purchased this in December of 2019, just one year out from purchase the unit stopped collecting water. I could not find anything wrong with the unit. I have been using it almost daily for a year. I am very disappointed that it seems this company is no longer in business.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Klemetti

customer_reviews.title: Stuffs Dry
customer_reviews.text: Live in a basement with a couple of fish tanks got a little dampness, water on the floor etc. This thing sucks it right up. Tad bit loud but trade for the purification.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: We live next to the ocean. ..so you can imagine. Mold is a big problem. Since I bought it..there is a difference. It's not cheap. But is big. Works pretty good. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: Unable to turn it on to work. Got continuous message that water tank as full. Materials were of poor quality; instructions were written in extremely poor English. Returned for refund. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It work perfectly, after used , I got 2 more for the rest of the house
customer_reviews.author: jorge ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working a little over a year
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since January of 2018 and it stopped working in March of 2019. It worked okay when it was functioning but it just quit functioning randomly. Would not recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Plug is over heatingNOT SAFE
customer_reviews.text: Plug is getting very very hot actually it melted away from the battery enclosure, fire hazard. Please take this product back.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We are using this to remove moisture from our RV. It’s working fairly well, although takes more time than we expected to pull the desired amount of moisture from the air.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Control

customer_reviews.title: Great product. No noise.
customer_reviews.text: They kick ass, and pull water like you wouldn't believe.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore D.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 3 months then one day I noticed the cord was really hot, unplugged it and let it cool down. It has never worked since, can't find a cord replacement online anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Flyfisher4life

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, Large water container. UV sterilization--smoke breaker. Drawback is that the black rectangle of the electric line gets hot, so I unplug after a few hours to cool down.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long, or I got a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: It only lasted one month did a good job but I cut it off to empty it. It never would cut back on, the red fill light stayed lit and it was only 1/4 full. I did not see a warranty with it and the English in the manual made me think it was from another country. .
customer_reviews.author: Valerie T. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Does squat for bathroom humidity, good for white noise
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing to relieve humidity in my small bathroom with no exhaust fan. Am using it only for the white noise it makes to cover up bathroom sounds.
customer_reviews.author: skomp

customer_reviews.title: Item isn’t good at all
customer_reviews.text: Item doesn’t match the specs and it looks bigger on the fotos . Item doesn’t dehumid according to the description on the advertising. I left the item working for 12 hours and didn’t even full fill half of time the bucket .
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: It barely worked
customer_reviews.text: It hardly got the humidity out after taking a shower of our 4x5 ft. bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great little dehumidifier!
customer_reviews.text: This works great in my basement-level bedroom. It no longer has that musty smell. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: April Joy Moss

customer_reviews.title: Power adapter is faulty
customer_reviews.text: The power adapter gets so damn hot that I am lucky I did not burn my house down and kill my dog!
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last :-(
customer_reviews.text: Bought in June and worked well for about 4-5 months but now no longer drawing out humidity in the bathroom. Tank empty after being on for two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jill Lieberman

customer_reviews.title: Made Room Hotter
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier made our room so much hotter and we were unable to sleep because of the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to handle and does a good job. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for a day then stops
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had better news. This worked great for the first day. Maybe even the first couple of days. Now it won't even continue working past 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Chele

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cord over heats and it is a serious fire hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Nora Morgades

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: It works as a white noise machine, but it collects hardly any water. We’ve had it running for days and the tank is still not full.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: It's a humid summer and this thing is capturing almost ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a humid summer and this thing is capturing almost nothing out of the basement and I can smell the humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pros: - Cute! - Small! - UV ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Cute! - Small! - UV Light! Cons: - Doesn't dehumidify too well. My showerroom is consistently at 24C with 80%+ humidity and this little thing didn't do much to help bring the humidity down--even with the door closed. I can't say it doesn't do anything; after about a week the cute little tub is about half full. Also the translation for the manual leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: John Blake

customer_reviews.title: Sent this back! Did not pull any moisture in ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent this back! Did not pull any moisture in despite it being 66-70% humidity in room. Ran for a full 24 hours with no change in humidity and bucket was near empty. Power supply ran extremely hot that I'm worried to continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Shabu Panda

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this dehumidifier to use in a house that was up for sale. We had previously had a different dehumidifier in the basement, but moved with it. So we ordered this one, thinking it would be a good option until we sold the home. Long story short, it didn’t pull ANY humidity from the air- even though our last dehumidifier dead so we knew there was plenty of humidity there. What a disappointment. Returned it after week because it did not function properly.
customer_reviews.author: matt and tj

customer_reviews.title: After washing, I put the laundry in my room ...
customer_reviews.text: After washing, I put the laundry in my room and turned on the dehumidifier, but about 300cc of water was collected for 24 hours and my laundry did not dry yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hyo Joong Kim

customer_reviews.title: it works better then the a/c dehumidifier and it use low amount ...
customer_reviews.text: i'm been using a week now. i put in the basement. it really compact and the noise is low. it works better then the a/c dehumidifier and it use low amount of electricity. it useful in in the summer when you don't want mold in your basement. it is also helpful because it has warning light when the tank is filled.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: I like the air purifying feature and hope that it holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well in a small bathroom. It's smaller than I expected, but it's meant for a small room, so just be aware of that. I like the air purifying feature and hope that it holds strong. Update: Stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and $
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work SO bad, my basement has been damp during this rainy season. I love the look and size of the unit, unfortunately its performance is little to none. After leaving it running 8am-8pm for DAYS, there is maybe a half an inch of water. Meanwhile, my neighbor is emptying their dehumidifier daily. To top it off, I just found the power cord to be scalding hott!! I give up, returning this.
customer_reviews.author: DavisBaby

customer_reviews.title: Nice When It Works
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our downstairs spare bedroom. It has a door that opens to the backyard and had a slightly damp smell and feel. This unit worked pretty well for reducing the odor and moisture level. It is also very quiet, especially compared to other units I have seen. My issue is that after 9 months of use, it just completely died. If it were more reliable I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Hungus

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using 2 of these for over a year now, and they're better than another dehumidifier I bought. However you should know that these smaller units don't do a ton to dehumidify. You'll dehumidify much more with a window unit AC. I keep these running anyway just to keep humidity <50%.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t pull much water
customer_reviews.text: It’s quiet and the air purifier helps keep the air smelling fresh, but it doesn’t seem to pull a significant amount of humidity from the air. My home is resting at about 75% humidity (with no obvious source of moisture) and this machine can run 24/7 and collect only about an inch of moisture in a couple days. It’s never got close to filling it’s tank.
customer_reviews.author: by Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated - I ordered two and am quite happy that I did. Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: LoveIzKind

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, small and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Quiet. Is small enough for one of our rooms which has a concrete floor. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: eatgoat

customer_reviews.title: You can easily sleep right through it
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. You can easily sleep right through it, nice unobtrusive sound. Seems well made. When I get a chance I’ll check water level and update review. For my bathroom without a window, but I do have fans. I may get another one for other guest bath. They do recommend an air gap be left around it of 19 inches which is a lot. Update. Give it the gap and it collects a lot more water. I put it on the floor for many hours and move it around. Bathrooms look a lot cleaner afterwards, it brighten them up.
customer_reviews.author: QIU YING

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product as worked perfectly since I received it in the mail. It has made it easier to breath, especially in this colder weather!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: After couple of months it stopped dehumidifying, no contact no of seller
customer_reviews.author: Abid R Mughal

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Does what its meant to do. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Extracts
customer_reviews.text: Extracts quite a bit of water for such a little guy
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Swain

customer_reviews.title: 24/7 operation for two weeks in a bathroom closet and only one teaspoon of water collected.
customer_reviews.text: Only collected about a teaspoon of water after running 24/7 for two weeks in a bathroom closet. Previous much smaller unit used in the same location would fill up about every 4-5 days with water. I gave it 2 stars for its size and its air filtering capability. Just wish the dehumidifier worked as well.
customer_reviews.author: bdouse

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all as advertised. Had only very ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all as advertised. Had only very small amount in bucket after running 16 hours in a 65% humidity room....disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice humidifier, I have a condo in florida and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice humidifier, I have a condo in florida and a good humidifer is a must all year. and this one had a really good reviews and a good price. works great. I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Does not work, except possibly for a very small space
customer_reviews.text: Didn't dehumidify. If this thing does work, it'd be only for a small space like a closet. Returned and bought a compressor style dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: One Smart Guy!

customer_reviews.title: It's noise level in loud than its size. I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's noise level in loud than its size. I was planning to leave it in my bed room for 24 hours usage. i have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Barely absorbs any moisture. Plan to return it for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reasor

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as expected. Collects very little water and the AC adapter gets very hot.
customer_reviews.author: MotaM

customer_reviews.title: I agree with “Terribly Disappointing” review!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the review titled “Terribly Diasappointing” had been posted before I bought two of these units! They do next to nothing in terms of collecting moisture! I bought them for a 14X16 room. Poor performance! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Horsefeathers89

product_meta.title: LUOYIMAN Electric Dehumidifier Quiet Operation with UV Sterilization for Large Space (2.5 Liter)
product_meta.description: Size:2.5L◤LUOYIAMN 2. 5Liter small dehumidifier for 107. 6 sq. ft◢ ♦Function : Dehumidify & Remove formaldehyde, dust and smoke♦【Negative ion】The machine works wit a Negative ion generator. They can remove formaldehyde, dust and smoke. 【Dehumidify】Applicable place: 107. 6 sq. ft /Suitable Room temperature : less tan 86ºF/Suitable Room humidity : 80%/ MAX dehumidification capacity: 1080ml/ 1 day / capacity of tank: 2500ml【Low noise & Safe working】Less than 40 dB, don’t worry and you can have a sweet dream. When the tank is full, it will stop automatically with sound signal. Specifications Size：9. 4x5. 6x13. 5 inWeight : 2. 2kg（4. 8lb）Water tank: 2. 5 Liter（85oz）MAX dehumidification capacity: 1080ml↖Applicable place: 107. 6 sq. ft ↖↖Suitable Room temperature : less tan 86ºF↖↖Suitable Room humidity : 80%↖Noise（dB A）: ≤40 NOTES AND Q&AQ：Why the power adapter gets very hot, nervousA：Don’t worry, it’s normal because the machine works so long and it will be hot than room temperature. Please check the plug is not too old. And if you have anything trouble please contact us. Q: Why there is no water in the tank, the machine totally works whole day. IT IS DEFECTIVE. A: This is a small dehumidifier, it is not power than the big one. Please check: Room temperature : less tan 86ºF and Room humidity : 80% And please close the window and the door when you use it in a roomPackage List: 1 x Dehumidifier 1 x Instruction Manual 1 x Power Adapte
feature_bullets: 【Negative ion】The machine works with a Negative ion generator. They can remove formaldehyde, dust and smoke.
【Dehumidify】Applicable place: 107. 6 sq. ft /Suitable Room temperature : less tan 86ºF/Suitable Room humidity : 80%/ MAX dehumidification capacity: 1080ml/ 1 day / capacity of tank: 2500ml
【Low noise & Safe working】Less than 40 dB, don’t worry and you can have a sweet dream. When the tank is full, it will stop automatically with sound signal.
